setting_1.name: Open VALTracker
setting_1.desc: Open VALTracker automatically right when your PC starts.

setting_1.name: Change Language
setting_1.desc: Change VALTracker's Language. This will open a popup.

setting_1.name: Skin Wishlist Notifications
setting_1.desc: Enable or disable Skin Wishlist notifications.
setting_1.desc2: Tip: Open VALTracker Minimized so that you don't get disturbed by the window popping up.

setting_1.name: Minimize to Tray
setting_1.desc: Closing the app window will minimize it to your system tray.

setting_1.name: Hardware Acceleration
setting_1.desc: Enable or disable Hardware Acceleration. Requires a restart for changes to apply.

setting_1.name: Legacy Theme
setting_1.desc: Toggle the App's Legacy Color Theme.

setting_1.name: VALTracker Rich Presence
setting_1.desc: Show your friends that your're using VALTracker with a custom Rich Presence!

setting_2.name: Hide Rich Presence when minimized
setting_2.desc: Hide VALTracker's Rich Presence whenever the app is minimized.

setting_1.name: VALORANT Game Presence
setting_1.desc: Set your Discord Status to a Rich Presence about your current match!

setting_2.name: Show Match Mode
setting_2.desc: Decide if you want to show the mode that you're currently playing!
setting_2.desc2: Turning off this setting will disable the ability to show your rank when playing a competitive match.

setting_3.name: Show Rank instead of Agent
setting_3.desc: Change the small picture to your rank instead of your agent if you play ranked!

setting_4.name: Show Timer
setting_4.desc: Turn the timer for the Rich Presence on or off!

setting_5.name: Show Score
setting_5.desc: Turn the score for the Rich Presence on or off!

setting_1.name: Add an Account
setting_1.desc: Open a login window to add a new Riot Account.

setting_2.name: Remove an Account
setting_2.desc: Remove a Riot Account from VALTracker.

setting_1.name: Import Settings
setting_1.desc: Import a settings profile. You can copy your own code below.

setting_2.name: Export Settings
setting_2.desc: Copy your settings share code to the clipboard.

setting_1.name: Reset VALTracker
setting_1.desc: Reset the App. This includes account data, settings, and all other data.

change_lang.desc: Select a language and click the button below. The app will restart to apply changes.

reset_app.desc: This will reset all data saved by the app, including account data, shop data, favourite matches and settings. This action cannot be undone.

apply_settings_profile.desc: This will restart the app and possibly change all of your settigns. If you want to back up your current settings, close this popup and copy your settings share code.

remove_riot_acc.desc: Select the account you wish to remove from VALTracker.

setting_1.name: VALTracker öffnen
setting_1.desc: Öffne VALTracker automatisch wenn dein PC startet.

setting_2.name: Öffne VALTracker minimiert
setting_2.desc: Öffne VALTracker minimiert, wenn es automatisch geöffnet wird.

setting_1.name: Sprache ändern
setting_1.desc: Ändere VALTracker's Sprache. Dies wird ein Pop-up öffnen.

setting_1.name: Skin-Wunschlistenbenachrichtigungen
setting_1.desc: Schalte die Benachrichtigungen für die Skin-Wunschliste ein oder aus.
setting_1.desc2: Tipp: Lass VALTracker automatisch und minimiert öffnen, damit die App direkt deinen Shop überprüfen kann.

setting_1.name: In Tray minimieren
setting_1.desc: Das schließen der Ppp minimiert sie in den System-tray.

setting_1.name: Hardware-Beschleunigung
setting_1.desc: Schalte Hardware-Beschleunigung ein oder aus. Erfordert einen Neustart, damit die Änderungen wirksam werden.

setting_1.name: Legacy Farbschema
setting_1.desc: Schalte das "Legacy" Farmthema ein oder aus.

setting_1.name: VALTracker Discord Status
setting_1.desc: Zeige deinen Freunden mit diesem Discord Status, dass du VALTracker benutzt!

setting_2.name: Verstecke Status bei minimierter App
setting_2.desc: Verstecke VALTracker's Discord Status solange die App minimiert ist.

setting_1.name: VALORANT Spiel Status
setting_1.desc: Lass dein aktuelles Match als Discord Status angezeigt werden!

setting_2.name: Zeige Match-Modus
setting_2.desc: Zeige oder vertecke den Modus, den du gerade spielst.
setting_2.desc2: Wenn du diese Einstelling aus schaltest, kannst du deinen Rang nicht anzeigen lassen.

setting_3.name: Zeige Rang statt Agent
setting_3.desc: Ändere das kleine Bild zu deinem Rang anstelle deines Charakters, wenn du ein gewertetes Match spielst!

setting_4.name: Zeige Timer
setting_4.desc: Schalte den Timer für den Discord Status ein oder aus!

setting_5.name: Zeige Match-Stand
setting_5.desc: Schalte den aktuellen Match-Stand ein oder aus!

setting_1.name: Füge ein Konto hinzu
setting_1.desc: Öffne ein Log-in Fenster, um einen weiteres Riot-Konto hinzuzufügen.

setting_1.name: Einstellungen importieren
setting_1.desc: Importiere ein Einstellungsprofil via code. Du kannst deinen eigenen Code weiter unten kopieren.

setting_1.name: VALTracker zurücksetzen
setting_1.desc: Setze VALTracker zurück. Dazu gehören Kontodaten, Einstellungen und alle anderen Daten.

setting_1.name: Abrir VALTracker
setting_1.desc: Abre VALTracker automáticamente al iniciar tu PC.

setting_2.name: Abrir VALTracker minimizado
setting_2.desc: Abre VALTracker minimizado al iniciar automáticamente.

setting_1.name: Cambiar Idioma
setting_1.desc: Cambia el idioma de VALTracker. Esto abrirá una ventana emergente.

setting_1.name: Skin Wishlist Notifications
setting_1.desc: Enable or disable Skin Wishlist notifications.
setting_1.desc2: Tip: Open VALTracker Minimized so that you don't get disturbed by the window popping up.

setting_1.name: Minimizar a la Bandeja
setting_1.desc: Al cerrar la ventana de la aplicación se minimizará a la bandeja del sistema.

setting_1.name: Aceleración de Hardware
setting_1.desc: Activa o desactiva la Aceleración de Hardware. Requiere reiniciar la app para aplicar cambios.

setting_1.name: Tema de Legado
setting_1.desc: Activa el Color del Tema de Legado de la app.

setting_1.name: Rich Presence de VALTracker
setting_1.desc: ¡Muestra a tus amigos que estás usando VALTracker con un Rich Presence personalizado!

setting_2.name: Oculta Rich Presence al estar minimizado
setting_2.desc: Oculta el Rich PresenceHide de VALTracker cuando la app está minimizada.

setting_1.name: VALORANT Game Presence
setting_1.desc: ¡Cambia tu Estado de Discord Status a un Rich Presence sobre tu partida actual!

setting_2.name: Mostrar Tipo de Partida
setting_2.desc: ¡Decide si quieres mostrar el modo que estás jugando actualmente!
setting_2.desc2: Desactivar esta opción deshabilitará el poder mostrar tu rango cuando juegues una partida competitiva.

setting_3.name: Mostrar Rango en vez del Agente
setting_3.desc: ¡Cambia la imágen pequeña a tu rango en vez del agente si juegas competitivo!

setting_4.name: Mostrar Tiempo
setting_4.desc: Enciende o apaga el cronómetro en el Rich Presence.

setting_5.name: Mostrar Puntuacióin
setting_5.desc: Activa o desactiva la puntuación en el Rich Presence.

setting_1.name: Agregar una Cuenta
setting_1.desc: Abre una ventana de login para agregar una nueva Cuenta de Riot.

setting_2.name: Quitar una Cuenta
setting_2.desc: Quita una Cuenta de Riot de VALTracker.

setting_1.name: Importar Opciones
setting_1.desc: Importa un perfil de configuración. Puedes copiar tu código abajo.

setting_2.name: Exportar Opciones
setting_2.desc: Copia tu código de compartir opciones al portapapeles.

setting_1.name: Reinicia VALTracker
setting_1.desc: Reinicia la App. Esto incluye datos de cuentas, opciones, y todo el resto de datos.
